about_the_game:
《Vehicle Laboratory》 is a non-hardcore casual single-player game that includes driving levels for different types of vehicles.

What can be expected

Players can drive different types of vehicles and complete set challenges in linear levels. Types of vehicles currently include trucks, tanks, fighter jets, speedboats and space shuttles. The scenes in each level have their own characteristics, including race tracks, city buildings, water tracks, and space, ensuring that each level has a different experience.

Players can experience the fun of smooth driving by continuously becoming proficient in driving vehicles.

Idea behind this game

This is my first game. I want to make a simple linear game with low repetition. I am an individual developer and wanted to create less repetitive content, so I integrated the different levels I had developed into this game.

I still have many ideas that I want to implement in the game, so I may update this game with more levels in the future, but please forgive me for not guaranteeing this. There are only 5 levels that can be played now.

I will listen to player feedback to make some adjustments to the developed content. For example, current feedback from social accounts shows that players prefer  jet levels. Anyway, I hope this game can bring an interesting experience to some people!

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti(VRAM 4GB) or AMD Radeon™ RX 580
